oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial view of Asheville Highway and Ruggles Ferry Road
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Harold A. Byerly
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial view of Asheville Highway and Ruggles Ferry Road, when both were two-lane roads. Partial view of Sunnyview School at lower left. L.W. Stipe home in center of photograph, with Sunnyview School behind it, obscured by trees. Ca. 1951-1954. Taken by Harold A. Byerly, who flew the plane and was the photographer.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Aerial photographs; Houses; Schools; Roads;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: To use photographs or to order reproductions, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8808. Please refer to Image Number if available and provide a brief description of the photograph.
